content.title: View the App
content.body:
1. Enter the following login credentials in your app.
    • Username: john.doe@temenos.com
    • Password: Temenos@123
  2. Click Login.
    The Accounts List appears.
  3. Click Recipients.
    The Recipient list appears.
  4. Click the add (+) icon to add a recipient.
  5. Select a recipient from the list to view their details.
    From the details page, you can delete the recipient.
    We will be adding the edit functionality of recipients in the next hike.
  6. To exit the app on your mobile device, swipe two fingers from left to right or shake your mobile device and click Exit App.
